Bullet|Rigid Sets|Add Selected.name: Add Selected
Bullet|Rigid Sets|Add Selected.info: Add selected objects to the specified rigid sets.

Bullet|Rigid Sets|Remove Selected.name: Remove Selected
Bullet|Rigid Sets|Remove Selected.info: Remove the selected objects from the specified rigid sets.

Bullet|Rigid Sets|Extract Selected.name: Extract Selected
Bullet|Rigid Sets|Extract Selected.info: Extract the selected objects from the specified rigid set into a new rigid set

Bullet|Rigid Sets|Empty.name: Empty
Bullet|Rigid Sets|Empty.info: Remove all member objects from the selected rigid sets and update their associated initial state and solved state nodes.

Bullet|Rigid Sets|Delete.name: Delete
Bullet|Rigid Sets|Delete.info: Delete the selected rigid sets along with their intial state, solved state and output mesh nodes.

Bullet|Rigid Sets|Set Initial State.name: Set Initial State
Bullet|Rigid Sets|Set Initial State.info: Set the initial state from current state of rigid set members.

Bullet|Rigid Sets|Reset Initial State.name: Reset Initial State
Bullet|Rigid Sets|Reset Initial State.info: Reset the initial state to the original state of the rigid set members.

Bullet|Rigid Sets|Select Initial State.name: Select Initial State
Bullet|Rigid Sets|Select Initial State.info: Select the initial state node associated with rigid set

Bullet|Soft Body Vertex Properties|Mass.name: Mass
Bullet|Soft Body Vertex Properties|Mass.info: Paint particle mass factor (multiplied by the main mass attribute)
Bullet|Soft Body Vertex Properties|Mass.command: python "import maya.app.mayabullet.BulletUtils as BulletUtils; BulletUtils.checkPluginLoaded(); import maya.app.mayabullet.SoftBody as SoftBody; SoftBody.paintSoftBodyVertexProperty('particleMass')"

Bullet|Add Colliders to Skeleton.name: Add Colliders to Skeleton
Bullet|Add Colliders to Skeleton.info: Add a collider to the ragdoll for each selected skeleton joint.

Bullet|Export selection to Alembic....name: Export selection to Alembic...
Bullet|Export selection to Alembic....info: Export the transforms of selected Bullet objects to Alembic

Bullet|Export all to Alembic....name: Export all to Alembic...
Bullet|Export all to Alembic....info: Export the transforms of all Bullet object to Alembic

Bullet|Select Bullet Solver.name: Select Bullet Solver
Bullet|Select Bullet Solver.command: python "import maya.app.mayabullet.BulletUtils as BulletUtils; BulletUtils.checkPluginLoaded(); BulletUtils.selectSolver()"

Bullet|Remove Bullet from Selection.name: Remove Bullet from Selection
Bullet|Remove Bullet from Selection.info: Remove all Bullet objects from selection and restore to original state

Bullet|Delete Entire Bullet System.name: Delete Entire Bullet System
Bullet|Delete Entire Bullet System.info: Delete all Bullet solvers and their rigid and soft bodies
